org.jruby.runtime.opto

Class OptoFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jruby.runtime.opto.OptoFactory

  • public class OptoFactory
extends Object
    A set of factory methods to construct optimizing utilities for compilation, cache invalidation, and so on.
